page.title: 18LEGENDS
page.content: It is a legend in Woolpit that in the reign of King Stephen a very strange thing happened.In those days our village was called Wulfpit. Some men were in the fields one day when one of them looked down into the holes which were called wolf pits and there he saw 2 green children.Everyone crowded round.The men were frightened of the children and the children were frightened of the men.The green children were hungry but they would not eat anything the villagers could offer them.Every lovely food was tried until someone thought of green food for green children.This of course was the right thing to do.The children were taught english and treated well but they were not happy and soon the boy died.Eventually the girl knew enough to tell her story.
